name: OldIsWin
description:
A game with simple rules.You can win the game by any path you like. We combine Light gun game shooting and platform together. It is a relaxing and funny game,players can shoot everything in the game to win. We hope to see your smile.

Rules： Just change the green terrain by shooting. Find and collect enough hearts to win.

Three cases you will lose:
1.Killed by monsters or traps. 2.Suicide:-)

Notes: Although you can play this game by yourself, we highly recommend two players together, one for keyboard control while another for mouse control.

Made by Yi Luo and Jinbiao Wu Connect us:605970195@qq.com
